description: I. The United Kingdom's Science and Technology Strategy for Countering International Terrorism. Aug 2009. 36 p. II. Countering the terrorist threat: ideas and innovation. How the industry and academia can play their part. Aug 2009. 32 p. III. Letter dated 27/08/2009 from Lord West of Spithead to Kim Howells MP regarding UK's Science and Technology Strategy for Countering International Terrorism. 2 p.
